NK015(ba)014:0: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'od zer brgya pa bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)014:1: bla ma dang dbyer med pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)014:2: dngos kun chos nyid gcig tu 'khyil pa yi //
NK015(ba)014:3: gtso 'khor sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa bar yongs shar bzhin /
NK015(ba)014:5: / 'khor 'das chos kun legs zlum dkyil 'khor cher /
NK015(ba)014:7: / 'jug pa'i srol snang 'od zer brgya pa spro //
NK015(ba)014:8: de la sgyu 'phrul zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs shing /
NK015(ba)014:9: mos slob kyi dbang dang sgrub mchod la 'jug pa'i nyer mkho stabs bder 'god pa la /
NK015(ba)014:12: mjug gi bya ba dang gsum gyi /
NK015(ba)014:19: grangs bsnyen rgyas 'bring bsdus pa gang rung sngon du song bas /
NK015(ba)014:20: khyad par gyi ched du bsnyen pa kha gso la 'jug /
NK015(ba)014:21: gnyis pa las kyi gzhi bzung ba ni /
NK015(ba)014:22: ston pa rdo rje slob dpon sogs gnas dus yo
NK015(ba)014:23: byad 'dzoms pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pa gtsor bor
NK015(ba)014:24: 'dus pa'o // gsum pa sa'i cho ga la /
NK015(ba)014:25: thog mar sngar gyi sgrub gnas byin ldan nam /
NK015(ba)014:26: gsar du brtag pa legs par sa yi dngos grub blang ba'i phyir /
NK015(ba)014:27: dkyil 'khor bsgom par 'dod don gsol te nam mkhar bteg /
NK015(ba)014:28: sa bdag brtan ma la bslang ba'i phyir /
NK015(ba)014:29: man+dala la dri bzang gi thig le me tog gi tshom bu bkod pa'i mthar /
NK015(ba)014:35: rang nyid skad cig gis khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
NK015(ba)014:36: g.yas sna tshogs rdo rje 'phyar zhing /
NK015(ba)014:37: g.yon dril bu dkur brten pa khro bo'i chos can yum dang bcas pa'i skur gyur /
NK015(ba)014:40: +aahmh'u gis 'dod yon bdud rtsi'i phung por byin gyis brlabs la /
NK015(ba)014:41: rang gi thugs ka nas lam yig ser po zhig
NK015(ba)014:42: chad pa man+dala gyi dbus su gnas pa las sa'i
NK015(ba)014:43: lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhi zhing 'dzum pa
NK015(ba)014:44: dar dang rin po ches brgyan pa /
NK015(ba)014:45: g.yas gser gyi bum pa dang /
NK015(ba)014:46: g.yon mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa /
NK015(ba)014:47: phag gi khri la bzhugs shing 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i 'od zer 'phro bar bsam la /
NK015(ba)014:48: rnam snang bdag por gyur pa'i rigs lngas dbu rgyan /
NK015(ba)014:49: sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs /
NK015(ba)014:50: badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dza zhes pas snyan brnan la /
NK015(ba)014:51: don dam gser gyi sa la mnga' mdzad pa'i //
NK015(ba)014:52: rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang yid 'ong brdal //
NK015(ba)014:53: nyi zla skar ma dag gis rab brgyan te //
NK015(ba)014:54: yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dbus na bzhugs //
NK015(ba)014:55: me tog dbus kyi sa la mnga' mdzad de //
NK015(ba)014:56: dbus kyi sa bdag lha mo sangs rgyas spyan //
NK015(ba)014:57: sku mdog btso ma rin chen gser gyi mdog /
NK015(ba)014:58: phyag g.yas rin chen gser gyi bum pa bsnams //
NK015(ba)014:59: phyag g.yon mchog sbyin phyag rgya ston mdzad pa'i //
NK015(ba)014:60: dbus kyi lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
NK015(ba)014:61: bdud rtsi mchod sbyin mgron du spyan 'dren na //
NK015(ba)014:62: byams thugs brtse phyir gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol //
NK015(ba)014:63: e h+ya hi ba su d+h+aa ri ma h+aa k+aa ru ni ka dri sh+ya ho /
NK015(ba)014:66: lag rgyab sprad mathe'u chung sbrel ba'i rgyas /
NK015(ba)014:68: dzahmh'u bam hos gnyis med du bstim /
NK015(ba)014:70: zhabs bsil bzhi bsnol gyis mchod /
NK015(ba)014:72: ba su d+h+aa r+ai sa p+aa ri wa ra i dam sogs btags pas gtor ma phul /
NK015(ba)014:73: lha mo chen mo sa 'dzin 'jig rten skyong //
NK015(ba)014:74: gser mdog phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams /
NK015(ba)014:76: / 'ja' tshon 'od ldan phag gi khri la bzhugs //
NK015(ba)014:77: de la phyag 'tshal bsnyen bkur mchod pa 'bul //
NK015(ba)014:81: 'dod don stsol ba la dgyes mdangs phyung bar bsam /
NK015(ba)014:82: 'khor gyi sa bdag mchod pa ni /
NK015(ba)014:83: sngar bzhin mchod gtor rnams brlab la /
NK015(ba)014:84: s+th+aa na pa ti k+she tra p+aa la sa p+aa ri wa ra e h+ya hi zhes spyan drangs /
NK015(ba)014:85: a k+aa ro'i sngags kyis gtor ma phul la /
NK015(ba)014:86: sa bdag lha klu 'khor dang bcas //
NK015(ba)014:87: gtor ma dam pa 'di bzhes la //
NK015(ba)014:88: bdag gi sgrub pa ma thon par //
NK015(ba)014:89: khyed la gnas 'di bdag g.yar gyis //
NK015(ba)014:90: ci bde bar ni gzhan du song //
NK015(ba)014:92: ya hi gats+tshasa rang gnas su gshegs /
NK015(ba)014:93: lha mo dpang gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)014:94: sa yi phyogs 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis
NK015(ba)014:95: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes
NK015(ba)014:96: kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du sgyu
NK015(ba)014:97: 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol
NK015(ba)014:98: bas dge ba'i stobs dang dpang mdzad du gsol zhes
NK015(ba)014:101: lha mo nam mkha' la dpung du bzhugs par bsam /
NK015(ba)014:102: badz+ra sa ma ya h'u dzah zhes pas dpang po'i lha nam mkha' gang ba spyan drangs /
NK015(ba)014:103: h'u bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin bsdus nas bdag la thim pas /
NK015(ba)014:104: bdag lus 'od kyi gong bur bsam la /
NK015(ba)014:105: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+r+ai he ru ka h'u phata /
NK015(ba)014:106: zhes brjod pas rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje sku
NK015(ba)014:107: mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo
NK015(ba)014:108: rje dang g.yon dril bu 'dzin pa /
NK015(ba)014:109: mi bzad pa'i khro bo 'bar ba'i sdang mig gis bgegs la blta ba /
NK015(ba)014:110: rkang mthil dang snying khar h'u las sna tshogs rdo rje me rab tu 'bar bar bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)014:112: sa yi phyogs 'dir rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag gis
NK015(ba)014:113: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes
NK015(ba)014:114: kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du sgyu
NK015(ba)014:115: 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs su gsol
NK015(ba)014:116: bas / gang su yang rung ba'i 'byung po gdug
NK015(ba)014:117: pa can g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa thams cad
NK015(ba)014:118: 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du dengs shig /
NK015(ba)014:119: gal te mi 'gro na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
NK015(ba)014:120: cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes las
NK015(ba)014:121: byung ba'i khro bo'i ye shes kyi rdo rje me
NK015(ba)014:122: rab tu 'bar ba 'dis khyed rnams kyi mgo bo
NK015(ba)014:123: tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ta re /
NK015(ba)014:128: sum+b+ha bzla bas rdo rje gsol dril bu dkrol te rdo rje'i 'gros kyis bskor te bgegs bskrad /
NK015(ba)014:129: h'u zhes khro bo rnams slar 'dus nas bsrung ba'i
NK015(ba)014:130: gur khang sna tshogs rdo rje me rab tu 'bar
NK015(ba)014:131: ba dang bcas pas phyogs mtshams thams cad khyab par
NK015(ba)014:132: bsam la / sa yi dbus su 'dug ste /
NK015(ba)014:133: lag g.yas kyi mathe'u chung mnan pa tri shul rgyas /
NK015(ba)014:134: ji ltar che mchog rdo rje yis //
NK015(ba)014:135: dpung bzhi bdud kyi sde btul nas //
NK015(ba)014:136: rgyal srid chos kyi dpang btsugs pa //
NK015(ba)014:137: de bzhin du ni bdag gis kyang //
NK015(ba)014:138: nges par bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri //
NK015(ba)014:139: sa yi dngos grub stsal du gsol //
NK015(ba)014:140: rat+na p+aa sham sid+d+hi ku ru sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK015(ba)014:141: lha mo 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'od du zhu nas
NK015(ba)014:142: sa gzhi la thim pas sa gzhi rin po che'i
NK015(ba)014:143: rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gyur par bsam
NK015(ba)014:145: zangs sam dmar po'i shing las phur bu rtse mo
NK015(ba)014:146: zla gam byas pa snod 'bras bu gang ba sogs
NK015(ba)014:148: pad+ma k+ai li k+ai la ya phata dzah snying kha'i
NK015(ba)014:149: h'u las byung ba'i pad+ma he ru ka dmar po
NK015(ba)014:150: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa dang po gnyis kyis pad+ma
NK015(ba)014:151: dang zhags pa / 'og ma gnyis phur bu sgril ba /
NK015(ba)014:152: smad phur bu zla gam rab tu 'bar ba'i rtse
NK015(ba)014:153: mo can du phyungs pas bkod pa'i phur bu dang
NK015(ba)014:155: k+aa ya badz+ra sogs kyi byin gyis brlabs te gzi byin ldan pa nyid /
NK015(ba)014:156: pad+ma k+ai li k+ai la ya wa sham sa ma ye h'u /
NK015(ba)014:157: wa sham ku ru s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)014:158: zhes dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi la btab /
NK015(ba)014:159: phur bu las byung ba'i 'od kyis sa gzhi thams cad khyab /
NK015(ba)014:160: bdag gi dbang du gyur par bsam ste bzung ba'o //
NK015(ba)014:161: rang gi lag pa g.yas kyi sor mo lnga la
NK015(ba)014:162: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor re re'i steng du h'u mthing
NK015(ba)014:163: ka re res mtshan pa yongs su gyur pa las
NK015(ba)014:164: rdo rje rtse lnga pa h'u gis mtshan par gyur
NK015(ba)014:165: / badz+ra ha na ha na kro d+ha h'u phata /
NK015(ba)014:166: zhes lan gsum brjod cing bsnun pas /
NK015(ba)014:167: rdo rje dang h'u gi 'od kyis sa'i nyes skyon
NK015(ba)014:168: thams cad sbyangs nas ye shes rang snang gi gzhir
NK015(ba)014:170: sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs pa'o //
NK015(ba)014:171: sa dang sar 'dzin gyi 'khrul rtog thams cad stong
NK015(ba)014:172: nyid de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su rnam par gyur
NK015(ba)014:173: / ma h+aa shu nya tha dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK015(ba)014:174: zhes ting 'dzin dmigs med kyis sbyangs /
NK015(ba)014:175: h'u rang nyid skad cig gi h'u las rdo rje
NK015(ba)014:176: sngon po h'u yig mthing nag 'bar bas mtshan par
NK015(ba)014:177: gyur / de las e yam bam lam ram rnams
NK015(ba)014:178: 'og tu chad pa las 'byung lnga rim brtsegs kyi
NK015(ba)014:179: steng du b+h+r+aum yig 'bar bar gyur /
NK015(ba)014:180: b+h+r+aum bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+ny+aa na badz+ra tsakra /
NK015(ba)014:181: ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor ji
NK015(ba)014:182: ltar 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin du bkra lam gyis
NK015(ba)014:186: bdag nyid gtso bo yab yum du gnas pa mnyam
NK015(ba)014:187: par sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems sprin las 'khor
NK015(ba)014:188: gyi lha rnams dang yan lag gi lha dang bcas
NK015(ba)014:189: gsal ba'i / byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis
NK015(ba)014:190: dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa'i dus gsum gyi magonapo
NK015(ba)014:191: sras dang bcas pa thams cad mkha' khyab tu sad
NK015(ba)014:192: gsal ba'i / par bsam zhing / badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs snyan gsan dbab /
NK015(ba)014:196: bzhi bsnol gyis mchod cing bstod par bya'o //
NK015(ba)014:197: phyogs bzhir gnas pa'i slob ma /
NK015(ba)014:209: de nams kyis gtso bo la /
NK015(ba)014:212: bzhi bsnol gyis mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK015(ba)014:214: zhi ba'i ye shes rang snang ba'i //
NK015(ba)014:215: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab mdzes pa //
NK015(ba)014:216: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yi mchog /
NK015(ba)014:217: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK015(ba)014:219: yon tan rin chen 'byung ba'i gtso //
NK015(ba)014:220: ma lus kun gyi re bskong ba //
NK015(ba)014:221: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan mchog /
NK015(ba)014:222: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK015(ba)014:224: rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med /
NK015(ba)014:226: / 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
NK015(ba)014:227: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog /
NK015(ba)014:228: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK015(ba)014:230: bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pas //
NK015(ba)014:231: thams cad sgrol ba'i ded dpon mchog /
NK015(ba)014:232: sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las bdag /
NK015(ba)014:233: dkyil 'khor chen po gsung du gsol //
NK015(ba)014:234: thams cad kyis thun mong du /
NK015(ba)014:235: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs shing //
NK015(ba)014:236: rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil //
NK015(ba)014:238: dkyil 'khor snying po bshad du gsol //
NK015(ba)014:241: gcig gis kyang phyogs de dag tu song nas bya'o //
NK015(ba)014:242: de'ang med na bsgom pas rung ngo //
NK015(ba)014:243: slob dpon gyis rdor dril bcas /
NK015(ba)014:244: phyogs bcu ma lus dus gsum gyi //
NK015(ba)014:245: rgyal ba sras bcas dgongs su gsol //
NK015(ba)014:246: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
NK015(ba)014:247: dkyil 'khor chen po bdag bgyid pas //
NK015(ba)014:248: bdag cag rjes su bzung ba'i phyir //
NK015(ba)014:249: sa 'di shis par byin rlabs pa //
NK015(ba)014:250: bde bar gshegs pas mdzad du gsol //
NK015(ba)014:251: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su bskul la /
NK015(ba)014:252: h'u bzhis byin bsdus te rang la bstim /
NK015(ba)014:253: snying rje chen po'i shugs kyis /
NK015(ba)014:254: rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje 'jigs shing rngams pa
NK015(ba)014:255: mi bzad pa'i khro bo'i sprin spro ba'i skur gyur
NK015(ba)014:256: pa'i mig gnyis ma dang ta las nyi ma dang
NK015(ba)014:257: zla ba / mig 'bras h'u las bskal pa'i me 'bar bas kun tu blta zhing /
NK015(ba)014:258: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
NK015(ba)014:259: dang thugs rdo rjer mi phyed pa'i nga rgyal dang
NK015(ba)014:260: ldan pas / h'u rdo rje 'dzin pa nyi ma dang //
NK015(ba)014:261: chos dang rta mchog snang mdzad pa'i //
NK015(ba)014:262: bdag nyid chen po nga nyid yin //
NK015(ba)014:263: thams cad bka' las deng ma 'da' /
NK015(ba)014:265: / thugs ka'i h'u las khro bo'i sprin mi bzad par
NK015(ba)014:266: spro zhing rkang mthil gnyis su h'u las 'bar ba'i
NK015(ba)014:267: rdo rje re res mtshan par bsam la /
NK015(ba)014:270: h'u bzhi pa'i sngags bzla bas dbang ldan nas brtsams
NK015(ba)014:271: te rdo rje'i 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor la g.yas su
NK015(ba)014:272: bskor / dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi cis kyang mi shigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du brtan par bsam /
NK015(ba)014:274: mig la sogs pa h'u yig las 'od zer 'phros /
NK015(ba)014:278: gur bla re phyi rol bskal pa'i me dpung rab
NK015(ba)014:279: tu 'bar ba'i dbus su b+h+r+aum las byung ba'i 'khor
NK015(ba)014:280: lo ser po rtsibs brgyad la sogs dang /
NK015(ba)014:281: rtsa rtse steng 'og tu phyogs shing rno ba'i dpal dang ldan pa /
NK015(ba)014:282: lte ba chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbus su
NK015(ba)014:283: bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rjer gnas pa'i thugs ka'i
NK015(ba)014:284: h'u las ma bcu 'phros pa rtsib nang rnams su
NK015(ba)014:286: slar yang thugs ka nas khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po 'phros /
NK015(ba)014:288: nyi gdan rnams kyi steng du myos shing 'gyel stabs su 'khod par bsam /
NK015(ba)014:290: slar yang thugs ka nas khro bo bcu phyungs te /
NK015(ba)014:291: mdun du bkod pa'i phur pa rnams dang gnyis su
NK015(ba)014:292: med par gyur pa ni stod khro bo'i gzugs can
NK015(ba)014:293: / smad phur bu 'bar ba'i rnam pa can du gyur /
NK015(ba)014:295: rkang g.yas kyi g.yon bskor byas nas steng du /
NK015(ba)014:296: badz+ra kro d+ha h'u ka ra h'u gardza gardza h'u phatah shar /
NK015(ba)014:297: badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya h'u ha na ha na h'u phata lho /
NK015(ba)014:298: kro d+ha ya m+aan+ta ka h'u pa tsa pa tsa h'u phata /
NK015(ba)014:300: badz+ra kro d+ha h+ya gri wa h'u hu lu hu lu h'u phatah byang /
NK015(ba)014:301: badz+ra kro d+ha a mri ta kun+da li h'u tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha h'u phatah lngar g.yas bskor gyis gdab tshul /
NK015(ba)014:304: badz+ra kro d+ha tre lo kya b+hi dza ya h'u b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha h'u phatah nub byang /
NK015(ba)014:305: badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta h'u tish+tha tish+tha h'u phatah lho nub /
NK015(ba)014:306: badz+ra kro d+ha ar+ya a tsa la h'u b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha h'u phatah shar lho /
NK015(ba)014:307: badz+ra kro d+ha ni la dan+da h'u da ha da ha h'u phatah 'og phyogs la /
NK015(ba)014:308: badz+ra kro d+ha ma h+aa b+h+aa la h'u s+pho ta s+pho ta h'u phatah sngags thams cad kyi mthar /
NK015(ba)014:309: g+ha g+ha g+h+aa ta ya g+h+aa ta ya sarba dush+tana
NK015(ba)014:310: h'u phatah k+ai la ya k+ai la ya sarba wa
NK015(ba)014:311: bam h'u phatah h'u h'u h'uh badz+ra k+ai la ya
NK015(ba)014:312: badz+ra d+ha ro a dz+ny+aa pa ya ti sarba big+n+aam
NK015(ba)014:313: k+aa ya w+aak+ka tsit+ta badz+ra k+ai la ya h'u h'u
NK015(ba)014:314: phatah ces gdab / khro bo rnams phyogs bcu'i bgegs
NK015(ba)014:315: la phur bu'i tshur du btab pas de rnams kyi
NK015(ba)014:316: lus phug ste g.yo 'gul med cing 'od gsal bar
NK015(ba)014:317: phatah ces gdab / bsam la / phyogs g.yas bskor dang /
NK015(ba)014:320: 'og gi phur bu nub tu gdab par bya'o //
NK015(ba)014:321: de nas rim pa brgyad kyi bsrung 'khor sgrub thabs las shes shing /
NK015(ba)014:322: de dag kyang dmigs med khyab brdal chen por 'jog go //
NK015(ba)014:324: lhag gnas kyi cho ga la /
NK015(ba)014:325: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar du khru do pa'i man+dala dris byugs la /
NK015(ba)014:326: sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad rdo rje'i rwa ba dang bcas pa bri /
NK015(ba)014:327: dbus su las bum chas ldan rgya gram gyi mtshan ma can bkod /
NK015(ba)014:328: shar du yi dam gyi thig skud gnyis /
NK015(ba)014:330: nub tu thod chu bdud rtsi lnga ldan /
NK015(ba)014:332: dbus dang mtshams kyi pad 'dab bzhi la tshan sna
NK015(ba)014:333: lnga mdog rigs sdebs pa dpa' bo 'bru lnga bris
NK015(ba)014:334: te bkod / mthar mchod gtor spyi ltar bshams /
NK015(ba)014:336: bdag gi rnal 'byor bzlas pa'i mthar thug pa sngon du 'gro bas /
NK015(ba)014:340: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las byung ba'i rin po
NK015(ba)014:341: che'i bum pa mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs
NK015(ba)014:342: pa'i nang du nyi ma'i gdan la h'u las sna
NK015(ba)014:343: tshogs rdo rje h'u gis mtshan pa yongs su gyur
NK015(ba)014:344: pa las / h'u big+h+n+aan+ta krita phata /
NK015(ba)014:345: ces brjod pas khro bo mi 'chi thab sbyor ljang
NK015(ba)014:346: nag rgya gram dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i skur gyur
NK015(ba)014:347: par bsam la / las rigs bdag por byas te dbang bskur /
NK015(ba)014:349: badz+ra sa ma dzahs snyan gsan dbab /
NK015(ba)014:351: dzahmh'u bam hos gnyis med du bstim /
NK015(ba)014:352: k+aa ya wak+ka tsit+ta gyis brtan par byas /
NK015(ba)014:353: kun bzang zhabs bsil bzhi bsnol gyis mchod /
NK015(ba)014:354: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i rgyas las bum la reg ste /
NK015(ba)014:356: ces brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK015(ba)014:357: lha 'od du zhu nas ye shees kyi bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor 'khyil par bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)014:359: swa b+h+aa wa bi shud+d+ha d+harma t+ae badz+ra sid+d+hi h'u /
NK015(ba)014:360: bdag gnas yo byad thams cad la gtor bas nyes skyon dag par bsam mo /
NK015(ba)014:364: stong pa'i ngang las nyi zla'i gdan lnga'i steng du
NK015(ba)014:365: rang gi thugs ka nas h'u s+w+aa am h+aa 'phros
NK015(ba)014:366: / ye shes kyi thig skud la thim pas dpa' bo 'bru lngar gyur /
NK015(ba)014:367: slar yang nyi zla'i gdan gsum gyi steng du thugs ka nas +aahmh'u 'phros /
NK015(ba)014:368: dam tshig gi thig skud la thim pas yi ge gsum du gyur par bsam /
NK015(ba)014:369: rang gi thugs ka'i h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas
NK015(ba)014:370: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mdun gyi nam mkhar
NK015(ba)014:371: spyan drangs / kun bzang sogs kyis mchod /
NK015(ba)014:372: rang gi mig gnyis dza yig las skyes pa'i nyi zlar bsam la /
NK015(ba)014:373: di sta drish+ta badz+ra am ku sha dzah zhes brjod cing rjes bskyod pa /
NK015(ba)014:374: 'bar ba'i blta stangs kyis bskul bas nam mkha'i de
NK015(ba)014:375: bzhin gshegs pa rnams sbyor ba mdzad par mos te
NK015(ba)014:376: / ma h+aa shu nya ta sogs ye shes lnga yi sngags rnams brjod pas /
NK015(ba)014:377: de rnams kyi thugs ka nas ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer kha dog lngar byung /
NK015(ba)014:378: ye shes kyi thig skud so so la thim pas
NK015(ba)014:379: de nyid ye shes lnga'i ngo bor gyur par bsam
NK015(ba)014:383: de bzhin du k+aa ya badz+ra sogs sku gsung thugs kyi sngags gsum brjod pas /
NK015(ba)014:384: nam mkha'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas gsum
NK015(ba)014:385: nas rdo rje gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer
NK015(ba)014:386: dkar dmar mthing gsum du byung /
NK015(ba)014:387: dam tshig gi thig skud so so la thim pas
NK015(ba)014:388: de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gyur par
NK015(ba)014:389: bsam zhing / 'bru gsum brjod bzhin du gsum tshan re re nas dang /
NK015(ba)014:391: rdo rje dril bu'i rab gnas ni /
NK015(ba)014:394: stong pa'i ngang las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i lte ba la kun tu bzang po /
NK015(ba)014:395: yar gyi rwa lnga la rigs kyi yab lnga /
NK015(ba)014:396: mar gyi rwa lnga la rigs kyi yum lnga /
NK015(ba)014:397: yas mas kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad la sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad /
NK015(ba)014:398: dril bu'i ste ba dang pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad kyi phyogs bzhir rigs kyi yum bzhi /
NK015(ba)014:399: mtshams bzhir gsang ba'i yum bzhi /
NK015(ba)014:400: zhal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang /
NK015(ba)014:401: rtse mo'i rdo rje rigs kyi yab lnga rnams kyi skur gsal bar /
NK015(ba)014:409: h'u +aa zhes pas lha rnams 'od du zhu /
NK015(ba)014:411: rdo rje thabs kyi rang bzhin ye shes lnga'i ngo bo dang /
NK015(ba)014:412: dril bu shes rab kyi rab bzhin stong nyid chos kyi sgra dbyangs sgrogs pa dang /
NK015(ba)014:413: gnyis ka'ang don dam pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du mos te /
NK015(ba)014:415: rdo rje dril bu rig pa 'dzin //
NK015(ba)014:416: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i /
NK015(ba)014:419: chos la de bzhin dbang sgyur shog /
NK015(ba)014:425: stong pa'i ngang las dam rdzas kyi steng du /
NK015(ba)014:426: h'u s+w+aa +aam h+aa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
NK015(ba)014:427: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi de bzhin
NK015(ba)014:428: gshegs pa lnga re re yang rigs lnga'i rang bzhin
NK015(ba)014:437: 'bru lnga brgya rtsa sogs bzlas pa'i mthar /
NK015(ba)014:438: h'u zhes pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsir 'khyil bar bsam /
NK015(ba)014:442: stong pa'i ngang las tshon sna lnga'i steng du /
NK015(ba)014:444: m+aum l+aam m+aam p+aam t+aam rnams gnas par gyur /
NK015(ba)014:446: so so'i phyag mtshan sa bon gyis mtshon pa rnams
NK015(ba)014:447: su gyur pa las de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga
NK015(ba)014:448: yum dang bcas pa'i skur gyur par bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)014:456: +aahsarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye h'u h'u /
NK015(ba)014:459: lha 'od du zhu ste rin po che'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul tshon 'bar bar bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)014:460: bris pa'i yig 'bru rnams bsnur nas mi mngon par bya'o //
NK015(ba)014:461: de dag yan lag gi rab gnas rnams so //
NK015(ba)014:462: de nas bum pa sta gon ni /
NK015(ba)014:463: bum pa gu gul gyis bdug /
NK015(ba)014:465: chu gtsang ma srog chags med pa dang lnga tshan
NK015(ba)014:466: lnga yi rdzas kun bzang yab yum sogs sngags kyis
NK015(ba)014:468: sems dpa'i sngags kyis mgul ching dkri /
NK015(ba)014:469: sgo ba'i sngags kyis 'bras bu can shing gis kha brgyan /
NK015(ba)014:470: me tog gi phreng ba can gyi gzungs thag rdo rje thub pa drug sngags kyis bzhag /
NK015(ba)014:476: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+r+aum las byung ba'i rin po che'i bum pa lto ba ldir ba /
NK015(ba)014:479: mchu 'phyang ba lha rdzas kyi gos kyi mgul chings
NK015(ba)014:480: dang dpag bsam shing gi kha rgyan dang ldan pa'i
NK015(ba)014:481: nang du / tasti tasti ma h+aa taste s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)014:482: lha'i chu bo gang+ga dang bum chu dbyer med par /
NK015(ba)014:483: lha rang rang gi gdan gyi steng du h'u s+w+aa +aam h+aa /
NK015(ba)014:486: h'u t+r+aam h+r+aim +aam mee th+l+him h'u m+aum /
NK015(ba)014:490: krem trum srum brem k+sham ye rnams gnas par gyur /
NK015(ba)014:491: s+pha ra sam 'phros 'dus yongs su gyur pas /
NK015(ba)014:503: h'u l+aa s+ya sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK015(ba)014:505: t+r+aam m+aa l+ya sa ma ya ho /
NK015(ba)014:506: h+r+aihh+aa h'u pad+ma pra da ma /
NK015(ba)014:508: dzim ku ru p+aa na h+r+ai /
NK015(ba)014:509: a nirti r+aa ga y+aa me /
NK015(ba)014:510: me d+ha ra ni s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)014:512: th+l+him ni s+sa ram p+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)014:514: h'u s+w+aa r+aa dz+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)014:515: bam d+ai ba su khi n+ai /
NK015(ba)014:516: m+aum sh+r+ai a r+aam g+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)014:517: hohgan+d+he tsit+ta h'u h'u h'u badz+ra tsit+ta /
NK015(ba)014:518: a a a badz+r+ai b+ha dra sa man+ta a /
NK015(ba)014:520: mu ne h'u trum s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)014:525: h'u ya m+aan+ta krita phatah ma h+aa badz+ra d+ha ro
NK015(ba)014:526: ma h+aa kro d+hi shwa r+ai dz+wa li n+ai h'u
NK015(ba)014:528: ma h+aa rat+na d+ha ro ma h+aa kro d+hi sh+w+aa r+ai dz+wa li n+ai h'u phata /
NK015(ba)014:530: ma h+aa pad+ma d+ha ro ma h+aa kro ti shwa r+ai dz+aa li n+ai h'u phata /
NK015(ba)014:532: ma h+aa karma d+ha ro ma h+aa kro ti shwa r+ai dz+wa li n+ai h'u phata /
NK015(ba)014:533: bskyed sngags rnams rim pa bzhin brjod pas /
NK015(ba)014:534: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
NK015(ba)014:535: te bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
NK015(ba)014:536: 'khor lo thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gsal bar
NK015(ba)014:543: mchod nas gzungs thag la 'jus te /
NK015(ba)014:544: bdag gi zhal nas sngags kyi phreng ba gzungs thag
NK015(ba)014:545: la 'khril te song bas bum pa'i lha rnams kyi
NK015(ba)014:546: thugs rgyud bskul / snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang sems
NK015(ba)014:547: ye shes kyi bdud rtsir bab pas bum pa gang
NK015(ba)014:548: thugs rgyud bskul / bar bsam / lha so so'i
NK015(ba)014:549: sngags gtso 'khor gyi 'gros sbyar pa ci nus bzlas
NK015(ba)014:550: thugs rgyud bskul / bar bsam / mthar / gtso
NK015(ba)014:551: bo'i sngags lan bdun bzlas nas thod chu bum nang
NK015(ba)014:552: thugs rgyud bskul / bar bsam / mthar / du
NK015(ba)014:553: phul bas / lha thams cad chags pa chen pos
NK015(ba)014:554: ye shes kyi bdud rtsir zhu ba bum chu dang
NK015(ba)014:555: ro gcig tu gyur par bsam zhing /
NK015(ba)014:556: bdug spos kyis kyang bdug par bya'o //
NK015(ba)014:557: slob ma lhag par gnas pa gzhan du shes shing /
NK015(ba)014:559: las chus dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi bsangs /
NK015(ba)014:560: +aahmh'u sarba sam shwa d+h+wa ni h'u phata /
NK015(ba)014:561: ces 'bri bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la gsal bar dmigs te /
NK015(ba)014:562: sngar gyis khongs su smos pa bzhin /
NK015(ba)014:563: badz+ra s+au tra sa ma ya ma ti ma kra ma h'u phata /
NK015(ba)014:565: dam thog tshul bzhin du btab la /
NK015(ba)014:566: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su bdag gi thugs ka'i sa
NK015(ba)014:567: bon las spros pa'i gzhal yas khang mtshan nyid thams
NK015(ba)014:568: cad yongs su rdzogs par bskyed la /
NK015(ba)014:569: lha gnas so sor rang rang gi snga brjod cing
NK015(ba)014:570: byang sems dkar dmar tsan+dana dang sbyar ba'i thig le
NK015(ba)014:571: gtso bo'i gnas su gru bzhi dang /
NK015(ba)014:572: gzhan rnams la zlum por byas la /
NK015(ba)014:573: me tog gi tshom bu bkod nas /
NK015(ba)014:575: bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan la 'dug par mos la /
NK015(ba)014:576: gtso bo yab yum gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i
NK015(ba)014:577: sgo nas snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems
NK015(ba)014:578: sprin sku'i dbyibs brgyud rdo rje'i lam nas yum gyi
NK015(ba)014:579: pad+mora spros pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rgyal ba'i dkyil
NK015(ba)014:580: 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa rnams rang rang gi
NK015(ba)014:581: gnas ji lta bar bzhugs par bsam la /
NK015(ba)014:582: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i zhes sogs kyi gsal gdab /
NK015(ba)014:590: spos dang bcas pas rdor dril 'dzin bzhin pas /
NK015(ba)014:591: mgon po kun mkhyen bdag nyid can //
NK015(ba)014:592: gcig dang du ma yongs grol phyir //
NK015(ba)014:593: ma lus bdag nyid dgongs su gsol //
NK015(ba)014:594: khyod rnams mos shing mchod pa dang //
NK015(ba)014:595: khams gsum yongs su bzung bya zhing //
NK015(ba)014:596: rang bzhin mnyam par bya ba'i phyir //
NK015(ba)014:598: las rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid //
NK015(ba)014:599: thugs rjes nye bar dgongs mdzad de //
NK015(ba)014:600: dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlabs nas ni //
NK015(ba)014:601: sa 'di yongs su bzung bar mdzod //
NK015(ba)014:603: zhes gsol btab pas lha thams cad dgyes par rol
NK015(ba)014:604: pa'i gzi byin mtha' yas pas de nyid du thim
NK015(ba)014:605: pas thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gsal
NK015(ba)014:606: bar bsam pa de dag ni sta gon gyi cho
NK015(ba)014:607: ga'o // be ga kra ma yam /
NK015(ba)014:608: sta gon gyi lha rnams nam mkhar btegs /
NK015(ba)014:612: tshon sna lnga 'byung rigs sdebs pas /
NK015(ba)014:613: m+aum t+aamsogs brjod pas phur khung bkang /
NK015(ba)014:614: g.yas pa'i mtheb srin gyis tshon rtsi lnga blangs pa g.yon pa'i mthil du bzhag la /
NK015(ba)014:615: sarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ya h'u h'u /
NK015(ba)014:616: lag pa g.yas kyi sor mo lnga la nyi ma'i
NK015(ba)014:617: steng du dpa' bo 'bru lnga gnas par bsam la
NK015(ba)014:618: sor mo lnga tshoms kyis g.yon pa'i tshon rtsi khung
NK015(ba)014:620: don ye shes lnga mtshon pa'i rtags rin po che
NK015(ba)014:621: lnga las grub pa'i ri rab tu gyur par bsam
NK015(ba)014:622: zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pas g.yon
NK015(ba)014:623: pa'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan nas brtsams te rtsigs
NK015(ba)014:629: sngo ba rnams sgo tshad bris te ka p+aa las dgag /
NK015(ba)014:630: rtsigs pa sbrel ran dus kha phye la tshon phra brtags pa yang gsungs so //
NK015(ba)014:631: cho ga tshon gzhung du dgye zhing /
NK015(ba)014:632: lha gnas so sor de dang de'i rnam pa bcas
NK015(ba)014:633: dgod pa ni yan lag can gyi sta gon no
NK015(ba)014:634: // tshon lhag la mchod bstod gshegs gsol bya'o //
NK015(ba)014:635: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dgram pa sngar gyi lhag gnas byas pa'i bum pa spros rol gyis drangs te /
NK015(ba)014:636: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bkod pa'i mtha' bskor du /
NK015(ba)014:637: rgyan dang mchod tshogs rnams rgyu bzang /
NK015(ba)014:638: sprus gtsang bkod legs par dgram par bya'o //
NK015(ba)014:639: dkyil 'khor la rab gnas kyi cho ga gzhan du gsal bas shes shing grub par dgos mod /
NK015(ba)014:640: gnyis pa dngos gzhi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa la /
NK015(ba)014:641: sngon du bya ba sbyor ba'i chos dang /
NK015(ba)014:642: dngos gzhi sgoms pa'i chos dang /
NK015(ba)014:643: rjes tshogs la sogs pas mthar dbyung ba'i chos dang
NK015(ba)014:644: gsum gyis sgrub thabs dngos grub rgya mtsho'i gter chen
NK015(ba)014:645: ltar las / dngos grub blang ba'i tshul tsam mdor bsdu na /
NK015(ba)014:646: thog mar lta nyan gyi gegs sel ba'i phyir /
NK015(ba)014:647: skad cig gis stong pa'i ngang las sogs nas rlung yang mi thar bar bsam bar dang /
NK015(ba)014:648: dz+wa la badz+rara sogs lan gsum gyis /
NK015(ba)014:649: rlung nag 'tshub ma g.yon du 'khor bar bsgom par btang la /
NK015(ba)014:653: b+h+r+aum bi shwa sogs kyis sngags rnams skabs bsdu na bzlas mthar /
NK015(ba)014:654: sman mchod nas bstod pa'i bar btang ste /
NK015(ba)014:656: hoh spros pa med pa'i dbyings rang bzhin gyi dkyil
NK015(ba)014:657: 'khor rnam par dag pa na dus gsum du gshegs
NK015(ba)014:658: shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
NK015(ba)014:659: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag dang ldan pa /
NK015(ba)014:660: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo sems dpa' la sogs pa
NK015(ba)014:661: rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa rigs mchog gzungs kyis
NK015(ba)014:662: yul gyi dbyings na rnam par bzhugs pa sems dpa'i
NK015(ba)014:664: ye shes chen po'i dbang phyug thabs la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid /
NK015(ba)014:668: ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dgongs su gsol /
NK015(ba)014:669: bdag cag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir tshogs pa rnams kyis /
NK015(ba)014:670: dang por gsang ba rdo rje theg pa'i sgor khas 'ches te /
NK015(ba)014:671: dam tshig gnyan po ma nor bar nos pa las /
NK015(ba)014:672: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams chag dang 'gal 'khrul du gyur pa /
NK015(ba)014:673: lha nye bar ma bsgoms pa /
NK015(ba)014:674: snying po dag par ma bgrangs pa /
NK015(ba)014:675: sbyor ba mang po'i bar bskum pa /
NK015(ba)014:676: dad pa can gyi tshogs bcag pa /
NK015(ba)014:677: dge ba can gyi thugs dkrugs pa /
NK015(ba)014:678: mchod pa lo zla las 'das pa /
NK015(ba)014:679: dam rdzas lag len rngo ma thogs pa /
NK015(ba)014:682: ting 'dzin thang lhod du gyur pa /
NK015(ba)014:683: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad spyod dam pa klong du ma gyur cing /
NK015(ba)014:684: sems can gyi spyod pa rang thad du gyur pa dang /
NK015(ba)014:685: khyad par du sgrub pa'i dam tshig dang /
NK015(ba)014:686: khyad par gyi dam tshig gi gnyan po mngon par mnos pa las /
NK015(ba)014:687: nyams shing zhig ral du gyur pa ci mchis pa
NK015(ba)014:688: thams cad shin tu gnong zhing 'gyod pa'i sems kyis
NK015(ba)014:689: mthol zhing bshags par mchi na /
NK015(ba)014:690: dbyings nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i ngang nas sku bzod pa chen pos dag par bzhes nas /
NK015(ba)014:691: tshangs pa mchog yid bzhin du thob par rtsal du gsol /
NK015(ba)014:692: bzhi pa dngos grub zhu gsol 'debs pa ni /
NK015(ba)014:693: gsol ba btab cing thugs rgyud bskul bas /
NK015(ba)014:694: ye shes pa'i lha tshogs rnams las dngos grub kyi
NK015(ba)014:695: rnam pa ji snyed pa'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar
NK015(ba)014:696: ba sgrub rdzas dang bdag la thim pas grub pa'i
NK015(ba)014:697: sa la sbyor ba'i dmigs pa dang bcas te /
NK015(ba)014:698: shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i shes rab /
NK015(ba)014:700: mngon par shes pa drug rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin /
NK015(ba)014:703: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi bla man chod nas /
NK015(ba)014:704: dngos grub kyi skal pa dang rigs rgyud gang lags
NK015(ba)014:705: pa thams cad phyi mar bsdad mi 'tshal bar dus
NK015(ba)014:706: da lta nyid du thob par stsal du gsol /
NK015(ba)014:707: rnal 'byor pa la bar du gcod par byed pa /
NK015(ba)014:715: so so'i rmi lam ngan pa dang /
NK015(ba)014:717: mi shis pa'i rkyen de dag thams cad phyir zlog
NK015(ba)014:718: cing ming tsam yang mi grags par mdzad du gsol
NK015(ba)014:719: / bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams /
NK015(ba)014:720: bcad gtub sdug bsngal lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur yang /
NK015(ba)014:721: grib ma phog pa'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzod pas /
NK015(ba)014:722: sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mod la 'tsho ba dang /
NK015(ba)014:723: gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa'i nyi ma stong phrag gi /
NK015(ba)014:724: 'od bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rtag tu 'byung ba dang /
NK015(ba)014:725: lus ngag sems la tshe 'dir rdo rje rab snang ste /
NK015(ba)014:726: re smon thams cad dus 'di nyid du stsal du gsol /
NK015(ba)014:727: sgrub rdzas gnas gsum du gtugs te myong la /
NK015(ba)014:729: gtang rag gi mchod pa bshams byin gyis brlab ste /
NK015(ba)014:733: bstod pa rgyas bsdus ci rigs pas bstod /
NK015(ba)014:734: yig brgya dang bzod gsol bya /
NK015(ba)014:735: ras bris la ye shes pa brtan bzhugs dang /
NK015(ba)014:736: b+h+r+aum bi shwa sogs kyis bsdu /
NK015(ba)014:739: ye shes kyi 'khor lo nam mkhar bteg la /
NK015(ba)014:743: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad /
NK015(ba)014:745: dz+ny+aa na man+dala badz+ra muh zhes gshegs su gsol /
NK015(ba)014:746: dam tshig gi 'khor lo sngar bzhin bsdus nas go bgo lus bsrung byas la /
NK015(ba)014:747: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mos pas /
NK015(ba)014:748: rol mo'i sgra bcas +aa k+aa ro bzla zhing /
NK015(ba)014:749: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag gis thog mar lha mtshan rnams bsdus la cung zad re mgor bkod /
NK015(ba)014:750: lhag ma rnams dbang ldan nas brtsams te gtso bo'i gnas kyi bar du phyags te bum par blugs /
NK015(ba)014:751: h'u mdzad kyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bsnol
NK015(ba)014:752: ba kam pa'i rgyas 'og phur nas bzung rim gyis
NK015(ba)014:753: phyungs la / spyan ma'i sngags bzlas pa'i 'os mas bur rtse bkru /
NK015(ba)014:754: khung bu la'ang gtor bas bgegs rnams bde stong gi ngo bor sangs rgyas par bsam /
NK015(ba)014:755: rdul tshon bkur sti bcas chu klung du dor /
NK015(ba)014:756: slar yang snod chus bkang ste /
NK015(ba)014:757: spyan ma'i sngags kyis sgrub khang la bsang gtor bya /
NK015(ba)014:760: bkra shis brjod cing dga' ston bya ba la sogs mtha' rgyas su grub par bya'o //
NK015(ba)014:761: rgyal kun bgrod pa gcig pu bla med lam //
NK015(ba)014:762: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba chen po'i lam tshul gyi //
NK015(ba)014:763: dngos grub rgya mtsho'i gter chen blang ba la //
NK015(ba)014:764: dkyil chog 'od zer brgya pa 'di nyid rmad //
NK015(ba)014:765: bkod pa'i dge bas rig pa 'dzin pa bzhi'i //
NK015(ba)014:766: bden 'bras go 'phang yid can kun dbang nas //
NK015(ba)014:767: sa 'dir bla med bstan pas snang byed pas //
NK015(ba)014:768: dpal 'byor dge bas 'tsho ba'i rgyur gyur cig /
NK015(ba)014:769: 'di yang shing rta chen po sangs rgyas gsang ba'i
NK015(ba)014:770: gzhung ltar 7gter chen rin po che sangs rgyas dngos
NK015(ba)014:771: mtshungs khyab bdag 'gyur med rdo rje'i mdzad pa'i gzhung
NK015(ba)014:772: las skabs 'dir 'os thob tsam du nyung ngur dril
NK015(ba)014:773: ba po bi dza'i ming gis de wi ko tra
NK015(ba)014:774: gnyis pa'i gnas su 'du ba chen por legs par
NK015(ba)014:775: bkod pa 'dis bdag kyang tshe rabs kun tu chos
NK015(ba)014:776: mdzod dam pa 'chang ba'i skal ba dang ldan par
